entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Savant Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:19 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
